{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$2.8M in 2021-2022** on contracts with C CORE.

Across 42 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 8 have at least one amendment (19%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 62% and the average number of amendments was 1.25. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$424.3K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.23 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$385.9K. The longest contract was 5 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$1.4M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}

- [C-CORE INC.](https://search.open.canada.ca/en/ct/?sort=contract_value_f%20desc&page=1&search_text=%22C-CORE%20INC.%22)
{{< /details >}}
